mapper.sql: s.session_id session_id, s.old_session_id old_session_id, inet_ntoa(s.ip) ip, s.is_app is_app, s.login_time login_time, s.operate_time operate_time, s.user_id user_id, u.name user_name, u.account user_account, u.trans_company_id user_com, u.role_id user_role, u.app_role_id user_app_role
mapper.select: select from tbl_session s,tbl_user u,tbl_role r where s.user_id=u.id and u.role_id=r.id and s.old_session_id = #{uuid} order by login_time desc limit 1

sql.if: and (u.account like CONCAT('${searchValue}','%') or u.name like CONCAT('${searchValue}','%'))

mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_session s,tbl_user u where s.user_id=u.id
select from tbl_session s,tbl_user u,tbl_role r where s.user_id=u.id and u.role_id=r.id
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_session (session_id, user_id, ip, is_app, login_time, operate_time) values (#{uuid}, #{user.id}, inet_aton(#{ip}), ifnull(#{isApp}, 0), #{loginDate}, #{operateDate})
mapper.update: update tbl_session set operate_time = #{operateDate} where session_id = #{uuid}
